summary: AN ORDINANCE rectifying and confirming the application for and execution of a grant contract by the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation and the Special Assistant for the Arts for financial assistance from the National Endowment for the Arts for the City's "Bumbershoot '74" project", accepting the moneys to be received under said grant for deposit in the "Seattle Arts Festival" subaccount of the "Civic Arts" account of the General Donations and Gift Trust Fund, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
